long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a streamlined user experience when using the Menlo Security Cloud Platform.  The Menlo platform provides a secure ZTNA access method for remotely using protected corporate applications.  The extension provides an application access menu personalized to the userâ€™s authorized applications.  It also automates redirection into the secure application access for direct access attempts.
